00018  * \internal

00028 /*
00029  * \internal
00030  * eQMI_OMA_DM_EVENT_IND TLVs defined below
00031  */
00032 
00033 /*
00034  * This structure will hold the Oma-Dm SessionState and OMA-DM Extended 
00035  * Session Info parameters information.
00036  *
00037  *  \param  sessionState
00038  *          - Session state
00039  *              - 0x00 - Complete, information was updated
00040  *              - 0x01 - Complete, update information is unavailable
00041  *              - 0x02 - Failed
00042  *              - 0x03 - Retrying
00043  *              - 0x04 - Connecting
00044  *              - 0x05 - Connected
00045  *              - 0x06 - Authenticated
00046  *              - 0x07 - Mobile Directory Number (MDN) downloaded
00047  *              - 0x08 - Mobile Station Identifier (MSID) downloaded
00048  *              - 0x09 - PRL downloaded
00049  *              - 0x0A - Mobile IP (MIP) profile downloaded
00050  *
00051  *  \param  sessionFailReason
00052  *          - Session failure reason (when state indicates failure)
00053  *              - 0x00 - Unknown
00054  *              - 0x01 - Network is unavailable
00055  *              - 0x02 - Server is unavailable
00056  *              - 0x03 - Authentication failed
00057  *              - 0x04 - Maximum retry exceeded
00058  *              - 0x05 - Session is cancelled
00059  *
00060  *  \param  TlvPresent - Boolean indicating the presence of the TLV
00061  *                       in the QMI response
00062  */
00063 struct sessionStateTlv
00064 {
00065     BYTE  TlvPresent;
00066     ULONG sessionState;
00067     ULONG sessionFailReason;
00068 };
00069 
00070 /*
00071  * \internal
00072  * Name:    QmiCbkOmaDmEventStatusReportInd
00073  *
00074  * Purpose: Structure used to store Session State TLV.
00075  *
00076  * Members: sessionStateTlv - SessionState and Extended Session Info Tlv
00077  *          
00078  * Note:    None
00079  */
00080 struct QmiCbkOmaDmEventStatusReportInd
00081 {
00082     struct sessionStateTlv sSTlv;
00083 };
